Detailed Description

Newton collider.

Collider updates movable objects, detects and handles collisions between them and fixed objects.

bool gpx::phy2d::NewtonCollider::updateHelper ( const NewtonDetecionData &  dData  )  [private]

Update helper.

Helper inline function used by update(). If collision occurred, impulse will be applied to moving object. If fixedMov is not 0, inverse impulse will be applied to it.
